/usr/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --extended-lambda --expt-relaxed-constexpr --generate-code=arch=compute_52,code=[compute_52,sm_52] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/cloth_sim.dir/main.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/cloth_sim.dir/cmake_device_link.o  /usr/local/cuda-12.8/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.a  -lpthread -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt  -L"/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu"
